title: I need of assistance with a very frustrating connectivity issue.
body:
My **client** is **crashing **and wont let me back into the game I started, so i'm just **disconnecting from** the** game** and unable to rejoin, the post login screen just becomes a** reconnect** button that** doesn't work**, and my friends list. 

These games are starting an I'm AFK from the beginning, not very fun for me or the 9 other people in the game, please help...

This client has been having its issues, but now it has ruined the next 5 queues, I have also left a 5 minute lower priority queue game, so I'm fairly sure it's going to be even more games in the lower priority queue with a probable 13-20 minute wait. If it is possible to revoke these penalties after my issue is resolved I would gladly appreciate it.

Thank you.

P.S The legacy client also doesn't open, even after I run the exe and administrator. It has worked in the past and now all of a sudden it's flipped, turned upside-down.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Is your game crashing or are you disconnecting? There's a difference.

Let me know :)
